thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Foreign Investors Pile Into U.S. Student Housing

author: Esther Fung
title: Foreign Investors Pile Into U.S. Student Housing

organizations.name: foreign investors pile into u.s. student housing foreign

text:
Foreign investors once flocked to trophy real-estate assets in the U.S. such as fancy hotels and sky-high towers.
Now, as the commercial real-estate market enters the late innings of a bull market, foreigners are diving into a less exotic sector: student housing.
In January, a joint venture between the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board,...
